title: Chronique d'une Ete
description: By 1960 the documentary had evolved with new sound equipment and lighter cameras. In a direct line from the ideas of Flaherty and Vertov, Canadian filmmakers as Michel Brault had made significant shorts as \\\\\\\"Les raquetteurs\\\\\\\" (1959), while in the United States Robert Drew created his seminal work, \\\\\\\"Primary\\\\\\\" (1960.)
